attributes.action: Britain must accept its fair share of refugees seeking safety in Europe
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of men, women and children are fleeing the Middle East and Africa to find safety in the West. We believes Britain must no longer turn a blind eye to their plight and must work with other European Union countries to set and welcome a quota of refugees.

To help show your support, sign our petition and tweet a picture of yourself holding a sign saying 'refugees welcome' under the hashtag #refugeeswelcome.
attributes.background: Thousands of people make the same crossing every day that Aylan’s family attempted on Wednesday. The UN’s refugee agency says that more than 300,000 have crossed the Mediterranean to escape conflict this year.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105991 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
